name: WorldCurrencyGuide
0:
”Alexa, Launch Currency Guide”
”Alexa, start a quiz from currency guide”
”Alexa, start a game from currency guide”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: currency guide
des: With this skills you can learn currencies of various countries around the world and also test your knowledge using quiz. Used APL to display images along with voice for screen enabled devices.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
